summary: This document is an email chain from July 2, 2020, regarding a subpoena response from Amazon.com, Inc. to the U.S. Attorney's Office. The subpoena sought information related to an address (338 East Washington RD) for a bail determination in a criminal case (Case No. 20 Mag. 6216). Amazon provided a redacted spreadsheet response, citing privacy and burden concerns.

persons.name: Teresa Rodelo
persons.role: Manager, Law Enforcement Response Team at Amazon.com, Inc.
persons.context: She is the Amazon representative who sent the official subpoena response to the AUSA, providing a redacted spreadsheet and stating Amazon's legal reservations.

events.title: Amazon Subpoena Response Provided
events.description: Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team, via Teresa Rodelo, delivers a redacted response to a subpoena from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding information tied to the address 338 East Washington RD, for use in a bail determination.

locations: Seattle, WA 98121 (Amazon.com, Inc. office at 2021 7th Avenue)
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to Amazon.com, Inc. for information related to the address '338 East Washington RD' in a criminal case (Case No. 20 Mag. 6216).
Amazon's response was a redacted Excel file, with titles of 'expressive materials' withheld for privacy and legal reasons.
Amazon formally objected to the request as 'unusually voluminous' and potentially causing an 'undue burden'.
The information was sought specifically to inform a bail determination in the case.
The document is an internal email chain forwarding the official response from Amazon's legal team to the prosecuting attorneys.
